author: samwilsn
content: If you'd like to write up an RLP informational EIP that defines those operations, that'd  be sweet!

author: siladu
content: Is there a particular syntax used for EIP code snippets? Thoughts on using python syntax to match EELS?

author: samwilsn
content: The goal of EELS is to be used in EIPs, so by all means do!

author: siladu
content: Ok so thoughts on this being an editing requirement for consistency across all EIPs?

author: samwilsn
content: Having an implementation in EELS is a requirement for filling tests now
